generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white lane markings, including a turn arrow, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and vegetation, which is designated for pedestrians and is therefore a sidewalk.
- building: A large modern building with a distinctive striped facade is visible on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: There are several trees with green leaves visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- terrain: There is a patch of grass and dirt on the right side of the road, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the gaps in the tree canopy in the upper part of the image.
- person: Two individuals are visible walking on the road, one appears to be carrying a backpack.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible along the sidewalk, likely for signs or lighting.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating a pedestrian crossing is visible on a pole near the sidewalk.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked near the building on the left side of the image.
